titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

bioghist.p: Dena Ungemach lived at 5234 Spruce Street in Philadelphia and was a science teacher in Philadelphia public schools. She died in 1958.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a small amount of documentation related to Ungemach's life and home. The property records include deeds, mortgages, insurance certificates, and other documents related to 5234 Spruce Street in Philadelphia (Dena D. and Pauline Ungemach, purchasers, in 1945). Materials related to Ungemach include school records and printed materials from the Philadelphia Normal School for Girls, Philadelphia High School for Girls and University of Pennsylvania, a copy of her will, some obituaries, a few photographs, and other miscellaneous materials.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.
